T02D2036:135b-1: rakta ya m'anta ka nishpa na na lo n'a ma /
T02D2036:135b-3: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba /
T02D2036:135b-4: bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2036:135b-5: de la re zhig dang por bdag gis sems can
T02D2036:135b-6: thams cad gshin rje gshed dmar po'i go 'phang la
T02D2036:135b-7: dgod pa'i phyir / bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed dmar po bsgom par bya'o snyam du bsams la /
T02D2036:135b-8: phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyis bsdus pa'i
T02D2036:135b-9: chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur stong pa nyid
T02D2036:135b-11: stong pa nyid la rab tu thim pa'i sgo nas
T02D2036:135b-12: chos thams cad bden brdzun gyi mtshan ma'i rnam pa
T02D2036:135b-13: thams cad dang bral zhing cir yang ma grub pa'i
T02D2036:135b-14: stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2036:135b-15: de'i ngang las skad cig gis ji ltar blos phyogs
T02D2036:135b-16: pa'i rgya chen por bar mtshams med cing snying po
T02D2036:135b-17: gcig tu gyur pa'i rdo rje'i sa gzhi 'bar ba
T02D2036:135b-18: dang / de'i steng du rab tu mkhregs pa dum
T02D2036:135b-19: bu gcig tu gyur pa'i sra zhing 'bar ba'i rdo
T02D2036:135b-20: dang / rjer ba dang / de'i steng du bar
T02D2036:135b-21: mtshams med par gcig tu gyur pa'i rdo rje'i mda'i
T02D2036:135b-22: dang / rjer ba dang / dra ba dang / de'i 'og tu rdo rje'i bla re dang /
T02D2036:135b-23: de'i 'og tu rdo rje'i gur 'bar ba dang /
T02D2036:135b-24: de'i nang du 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa ser po
T02D2036:135b-25: g-yas su shin tu drag por 'khor ba rtsibs kyi
T02D2036:135b-26: rtse mo la nye bar gnas pa'i shin tu 'jigs
T02D2036:135b-27: pa'i khro mo bcu dang bcas pa'i lte ba'i nang
T02D2036:136a-0: ri rab kyi steng du gzhal yas khang gi dbus @136a * //
T02D2036:136a-1: su sna tshogs mtsho skyes dang nyi ma la gnas
T02D2036:136a-2: pa'i ma he dmar nag shin tu khros pa rus
T02D2036:136a-3: rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyab tu /
T02D2036:136a-4: gshin rje yab yum zhabs g-yas bskum pa /
T02D2036:136a-5: g-yon brkyang bas mnan pa'i bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed dmar po nyi ma bye ba'i 'od can /
T02D2036:136a-7: phyag g-yas na khams gsum rnam par 'joms pa'i dbyug to dkar po bsnams pa /
T02D2036:136a-8: phyag g-yon na bdud ma lus pa'i khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa thugs kar 'dzin pa /
T02D2036:136a-9: brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa can /
T02D2036:136a-10: mi mgo lnga'i phreng bas dpral bar brgyan pa /
T02D2036:136a-12: klu brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan pa /
T02D2036:136a-13: khrag 'dzag pa'i mi mgo lnga bcu'i phreng ba mgul par 'phyad ba /
T02D2036:136a-14: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs bsnams pa /
T02D2036:136a-15: sma ra dmar skya dbu skra dmar ser gyen la brdzes pa /
T02D2036:136a-18: nyi ma lta bu'i spyan gsum dmar la zlum pa /
T02D2036:136a-19: zhal khro gnyer can mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D2036:136a-21: khro bo'i tshul gyis bzhad pa'i zhal /
T02D2036:136a-23: yum rdo rje ro langs mas 'khyud pa /
T02D2036:136a-24: lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D2036:136a-27: phyag g-yon na gdug pa bdud kyi khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa /
T02D2036:136a-28: g-yas na rdo rje gri gug 'dzin pa /
T02D2036:136a-29: mgo bo skam po lnga bcu'i phreng ba mgul bar 'phyad ba /
T02D2036:136a-30: de las gzhan yab nyid 'dra ba can bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2036:136a-31: de la sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i shar
T02D2036:136a-32: gyi 'dab ma la nyi ma la gnas pa'i gti
T02D2036:136a-33: mug gshin rje gshed sku mdog dkar po /
T02D2036:136a-34: rdo rje rtsi ka nag mo la 'khyud pa /
T02D2036:136a-35: lho'i padma'i 'dab ma la nyi ma la gnas pa'i
T02D2036:136a-36: phra ma gshin rje gshed sku mdog ser po rdo
T02D2036:136a-37: rje phag mo ser mo la 'khyud pa /
T02D2036:136a-38: nub kyi padma'i 'dab ma la nyi ma la gnas
T02D2036:136a-39: pa'i 'dod chags gshin rje gshed sku mdog dmar po
T02D2036:136a-40: rdo rje dbyangs can ma dkar mo la 'khyud pa
T02D2036:136a-41: / byang gi padma'i 'dab ma la nyi ma la
T02D2036:136a-42: gnas pa'i phrag dog gshin rje gshed sku mdog ljang
T02D2036:136a-43: gu lha mo goo r'i ljang gu la 'khyud pa'o
T02D2036:136a-44: / // gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i
T02D2036:136b-0: dpa' bo bzhi ni zhal gcig @136b phyag gnyis pa
T02D2036:136b-1: / // / phyag g-yas rnams na rim pa bzhin 'khor lo dang /
T02D2036:136b-5: phyag g-yon thams cad khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa thugs kar 'dzin pa /
T02D2036:136b-6: de las gzhan thams cad gtso bo dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D2036:136b-7: rdo rje tsartsi ka la sogs pa'i dpa' mo bzhi ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D2036:136b-8: g-yas rdo rje gri gug / g-yon khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa /
T02D2036:136b-9: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D2036:136b-12: dbu skra grol ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2036:136b-13: me'i mtshams kyi padma'i 'dab ma la /
T02D2036:136b-14: mu men gser chab kyi bum pa /
T02D2036:136b-15: tsa tur sa ma yas gang ba /
T02D2036:136b-16: bden bral gyi mtshams kyi padma'i 'dab ma la gser gyi bum pa ka to ris gang ba /
T02D2036:136b-17: rlung gi mtshams kyi padma'i 'dab ma la byi ru'i bum pa sihlas gang ba /
T02D2036:136b-18: dbang ldan gyi mtshams kyi padma'i 'dab ma la dngul gyi bum pa ga bur gyis gang ba /
T02D2036:136b-19: bum pa bzhi ka 'ang kha thod pas bcad pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2036:136b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar sna tshogs padma dang
T02D2036:136b-21: nyi ma la gnas pa'i rang nyid lta bu'i ye
T02D2036:136b-22: shes sems dpa'i thugs kar sna tshogs padma dang nyi
T02D2036:136b-23: ma la gnas pa'i dbyug to dkar po'i dbus su
T02D2036:136b-24: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge h'um dmar pos
T02D2036:136b-26: de la bcom ldan 'das nyid la ni mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D2036:136b-27: gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa bzhi la
T02D2036:136b-28: ni go rims bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad dang
T02D2036:136b-31: don yod grub pas rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D2036:136b-32: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i snying po ni /
T02D2036:136b-33: aom hr'i:shti:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2036:136b-35: de ltar bshad par gyur mod kyang //
T02D2036:136b-36: phun tshogs sku ni dpag med de //
T02D2036:136b-37: chu yi gter las chu 'dzin gyis //
T02D2036:136b-38: chu blangs zad par mi 'gyur bzhin //
T02D2036:136b-39: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba /
